DOC.brief_title: Does Vivo Culture Pre-cleavage Stage Embryo Reduce Incidence Aneuploidy ?

DOC.criteria: Signed Informed Consent subject partner Women , age 18 38 year ( 38th birthday ) ≤ 2 previous stimulation cycle Routinely measure hormonal level within normal range ( i.e . FSH , LH , E2 , PRL ) No uterine ovarian anatomical abnormality and/or alteration would compromise device delivery function uterus demonstrate ultrasound trial insertion 19 ≤ BMI ≤ 29 kg/m2 History previous moderate severe ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( OHSS ) Severe endometriosis Any active infection would contraindicate ART , discretion investigator Severe male factor partner ( cryptozoospermia nonobstructive azoospermia )
